items.content_html: MChat is a lightweight, focus on type safety, real-time chat application built with TypeScript, utilizing React on the frontend and Express on the backend. The app features a responsive design with Tailwind CSS and leverages Socket.io for seamless web socket communication.
items.title: carlosarraes/mchat: MChat is a lightweight, focus on type safety,  real-time chat application built with TypeScript, utilizing React on the frontend and Express on the backend. The app features a responsive design with Tailwind CSS and leverages Socket.io for seamless web socket communication.
